value.0: The Ankarres Sapphire is a crystal that possesses legendary healing powers and numerous other effects. It is one of the most potent crystals that can be used in lightsaber creation. It is also a crystal of great power and can aid a Jedi in battle. Legend has it that this sapphire can only be wielded by light-siders. If the crystal/saber is to be touched by someone dark, it will slowly heat up and burn their hand. Supposedly, this effect can apparantly be reversed if it falls into the wrong hands.
